topic.title: Change bucket settings
topic.shortdesc: Bucket settings can be changed if needed.

body.p: To change settings on an existing bucket, go to the Data Buckets tab in the Couchbase Web Console.

ol.li: In the list of buckets, click on the blue triangle next to the bucket name.

body.p: For descriptions of each setting in this window, see Create a new bucket.
You can change bucket setting also with the CLI command bucket-edit or the REST command rest-bucket-parameters.
